name: caffeine-usersnap
description: Easier site annotation tool for Caffeine RDE

scripts.start: pip3 install Pillow && pip3 install Flask && pip3 install -U flask-cors && pip3 install mss && pip3 install numpy && export FLASK_APP=overlay/functions/process/accept && export export FLASK_RUN_PORT=8669 && export FLASK_DEBUG=0 && python3 -m flask run & nodemon app.js
